name: Make-Ahead Garlic Toast
author: cook205
summary: I love this because I always have leftover bread and it goes to waste most of the time. The best part is that you can pull out as many pieces as you want and bake them straight from the freezer!
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf Italian bread, cut into 1 inch slices
directions: Mix butter, Parmesan cheese, parsley, and garlic powder in a bowl
Arrange Italian bread on a large baking sheet and spread each slice with garlic butter mixture
Place baking sheet in freezer and freeze until bread solid, about 1 hour
Transfer bread to a resealable plastic freezer bag until ready to use
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Arrange desired number of slices, butter-side up, on a baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until bread is toasted and butter is melted, 5 to 7 minutes
